terms.sub: Please check and consent to the updated Terms of Use below.

cancel.1: Cancellations must be made at least 7 days in advance.
cancel.2: A cancellation fee may apply based on date of request.

use.1: Please respect the event rules and instructions.
use.2: Services are available for international customers only.
use.3: We do not allow third-party resale of packages.

privacy.1: We collect personal information only for the purpose of reservation and communication.
privacy.2: Your information will not be shared with third parties without your consent.
privacy.3: You may request deletion of your data by contacting support.
privacy.4: Data is encrypted and stored securely.

ad.1: I agree to receive emails and push notifications related to package updates, events, and exclusive benefits.
ad.2: I can update my preferences or unsubscribe at any time through the app settings.

cancel-free.1: Please note that this is a promotional event, and no cancellation fees will apply.
cancel-free.2: It is normal for your booking status to appear as "Waiting" when checked under "My Bookings."
cancel-free.3: We look forward to your participation!
